name: User add to cart and remove the single product from inventory page

children.description: Given user is on Inventory page when login from given sheetname "Inventory" and rownumber 0
When user add to cart single product from given sheetname "Inventory" and rownumber 0
Then user get the shopping cart badge number
And the badge number should be contain from given sheetname "Inventory" and rownumber 0
When user remove the single product from given sheetname "Inventory" and rownumber 0
Then the badge number should not display

title: User add to cart and remove the single product from inventory page

dataTable.scenarioOutline:
Given user is on Inventory page when login from given sheetname "<SheetName>" and rownumber <RowNumber>
When user add to cart single product from given sheetname "<SheetName>" and rownumber <RowNumber>
Then user get the shopping cart badge number
And the badge number should be contain from given sheetname "<SheetName>" and rownumber <RowNumber>
When user remove the single product from given sheetname "<SheetName>" and rownumber <RowNumber>
Then the badge number should not display
